verbLexeme: 1. To make a picture, pattern, or diagram using a pencil, pen or crayon. English = draw.
2. To produce a picture quickly and without a lot of details. English = sketch.
nominalLexeme: 1. A picture which someone has made with a pencil, pen or crayon. English = drawing.
2. A drawing that is done quickly without a lot of details. English = sketch.
